TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Lazy`1<T> extends System.Object
generic <typename T> public ref class Lazy

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 正在延遲初始化的物件類型。

span.span: The type of object that is being lazily initialized.

summary.span: 提供延遲初始設定的支援。

span.span: Provides support for lazy initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 延後建立大型或需要大量資源的物件或需要大量資源的工作，執行這類的建立或執行可能不會發生在程式的存留期內時，特別是使用延遲初始設定。Use lazy initialization to defer the creation of a large or resource-intensive object, or the execution of a resource-intensive task, particularly when such creation or execution might not occur during the lifetime of the program. 若要準備延遲初始設定，您建立的執行個體。To prepare for lazy initialization, you create an instance of . 型別引數您所建立的物件會指定您想要執行延遲初始化的物件型別。The type argument of the object that you create specifies the type of the object that you want to initialize lazily. 建構函式用來建立物件可以決定所初始化的特性。The constructor that you use to create the object determines the characteristics of the initialization. 延遲初始化會在第一次存取 屬性時發生。Lazy initialization occurs the first time the property is accessed. 在大部分情況下，選擇建構函式取決於您對兩個問題的答案：In most cases, choosing a constructor depends on your answers to two questions: - 會從多個執行緒存取延遲初始化的物件嗎？Will the lazily initialized object be accessed from more than one thread? 如果是這樣，物件可能會建立任何執行緒上。If so, the object might create it on any thread. 您可以使用其中一種簡單的建構函式的預設行為是建立安全執行緒物件，因此延遲具現化物件只能有一個執行個體建立無論多少執行緒嘗試存取它。You can use one of the simple constructors whose default behavior is to create a thread-safe object, so that only one instance of the lazily instantiated object is created no matter how many threads try to access it. 若要建立不是安全執行緒的物件，您必須使用可讓您指定沒有執行緒安全的建構函式。To create a object that is not thread safe, you must use a constructor that enables you to specify no thread safety. > [!CAUTION] > 進行物件具備執行緒安全，不會保護延遲初始化的物件。Making the object thread safe does not protect the lazily initialized object. 如果多個執行緒可以存取的延遲初始化的物件，您必須進行其屬性和方法安全地用於多執行緒存取。If multiple threads can access the lazily initialized object, you must make its properties and methods safe for multithreaded access. - 延遲初始設定是否需要大量程式碼，或延遲初始化的物件是否有預設建構函式不需要而且不會擲回例外狀況的所有內容？Does lazy initialization require a lot of code, or does the lazily initialized object have a default constructor that does everything you need and doesn't throw exceptions? 如果您需要撰寫初始化程式碼，或需要處理的例外狀況，使用其中一個會採用的 factory 方法的建構函式。If you need to write initialization code or if exceptions need to be handled, use one of the constructors that takes a factory method. 撰寫初始化程式碼中的 factory 方法。Write your initialization code in the factory method. 下表顯示哪些建構函式，來選擇，請根據這兩項因素：The following table shows which constructor to choose, based on these two factors: |物件會由存取Object will be accessed by|如果不不需要任何初始設定程式碼 （預設建構函式），使用If no initialization code is required (default constructor), use|如果不需要的初始化程式碼，使用If initialization code is required, use| |--------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| |多個執行緒Multiple threads||| |一個執行緒One thread| 與`isThreadSafe`設`false`。 with `isThreadSafe` set to `false`.| 與`isThreadSafe`設`false`。 with `isThreadSafe` set to `false`.| 您可以使用 lambda 運算式來指定此處理站方法。You can use a lambda expression to specify the factory method. 這會在一個位置中保留所有初始化程式碼。This keeps all the initialization code in one place. Lambda 運算式擷取的內容，包括您執行延遲初始化的物件建構函式傳遞任何引數。The lambda expression captures the context, including any arguments you pass to the lazily initialized object's constructor. **快取例外狀況**當您使用處理站方法時，會快取例外狀況。**Exception caching** When you use factory methods, exceptions are cached. 也就是說，如果的 factory 方法，就會擲回例外狀況的第一個階段的執行緒嘗試存取屬性物件，每個後續的嘗試會擲回相同的例外狀況。That is, if the factory method throws an exception the first time a thread tries to access the property of the object, the same exception is thrown on every subsequent attempt. 如此可確保每次呼叫屬性會產生相同的結果，並避免如果不同的執行緒都會取得不同的結果可能會產生難以察覺的錯誤。This ensures that every call to the property produces the same result and avoids subtle errors that might arise if different threads get different results. 代表的實際`T`，否則會初始化在某個較早的時間點，通常在啟動期間。The stands in for an actual `T` that otherwise would have been initialized at some earlier point, usually during startup. 在該較早的時間點失敗是通常是嚴重威脅。A failure at that earlier point is usually fatal. 如果沒有可復原的失敗的可能性，我們建議您至初始化常式 （在此情況下，處理站方法），建立重試邏輯，就如同如果您沒有使用延遲初始設定。If there is a potential for a recoverable failure, we recommend that you build the retry logic into the initialization routine (in this case, the factory method), just as you would if you weren’t using lazy initialization. **鎖定的替代方式**在某些情況下，您可能想要避免的額外負荷物件的預設鎖定行為。**Alternative to locking** In certain situations, you might want to avoid the overhead of the object's default locking behavior. 在罕見的情況下，可能會有死結。In rare situations, there might be a potential for deadlocks. 在這種情況下，您可以使用或建構函式，並指定。In such cases, you can use the or constructor, and specify . 這可讓物件以建立數個執行緒的每個上的延遲初始化物件的複本，如果呼叫執行緒屬性同時。This enables the object to create a copy of the lazily initialized object on each of several threads if the threads call the property simultaneously. 物件可確保所有執行緒使用相同的執行個體的延遲初始化的物件，並捨棄未使用的執行個體。The object ensures that all threads use the same instance of the lazily initialized object and discards the instances that are not used. 因此，減少鎖定負擔成本是您的程式可能會有時建立，並捨棄高度耗費資源物件的額外複本。Thus, the cost of reducing the locking overhead is that your program might sometimes create and discard extra copies of an expensive object. 在大部分情況下，這是不太可能項目。In most cases, this is unlikely. 如範例和建構函式都會表現此行為。The examples for the and constructors demonstrate this behavior. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您指定，例外狀況會永遠不會快取，即使您指定的 factory 方法。When you specify , exceptions are never cached, even if you specify a factory method. **對等的建構函式**除了啟用使用、和建構函式可以複製其他建構函式的功能。**Equivalent constructors** In addition to enabling the use of , the and constructors can duplicate the functionality of the other constructors. 下表顯示對等的行為會產生的參數值。The following table shows the parameter values that produce equivalent behavior. |若要建立物件To create a object that is|建構函式具有`LazyThreadSafetyMode``mode`參數，設定`mode`至For constructors that have a `LazyThreadSafetyMode` `mode` parameter, set `mode` to|建構函式的布林值為`isThreadSafe`參數，設定`isThreadSafe`至For constructors that have a Boolean `isThreadSafe` parameter, set `isThreadSafe` to|不含任何執行緒安全性參數的建構函式For constructors with no thread safety parameters| |-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------| |完整具備執行緒安全。使用鎖定來確保只有一個執行緒初始化值。Fully thread safe; uses locking to ensure that only one thread initializes the value.||`true`|所有這類建構函式是完全安全執行緒。All such constructors are fully thread safe.| |不具備執行緒安全。Not thread safe.||`false`|不適用。Not applicable.| |完整具備執行緒安全。執行緒競爭來初始化值。Fully thread safe; threads race to initialize the value.||不適用。Not applicable.|不適用。Not applicable.| **其他功能**有關使用執行緒靜態欄位，或做為備份存放區屬性，請參閱[延遲初始設定](~/docs/framework/performance/lazy-initialization.md)。**Other capabilities** For information about the use of with thread-static fields, or as the backing store for properties, see [Lazy Initialization](~/docs/framework/performance/lazy-initialization.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，以提供延遲初始設定，以從多個執行緒存取。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to provide lazy initialization with access from multiple threads. > [!NOTE] > 此範例會使用建構函式。The example uses the constructor. 它也示範如何使用建構函式 (指定`true`如`isThreadSafe`) 和建構函式 (指定如`mode`)。It also demonstrates the use of the constructor (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`) and the constructor (specifying for `mode`). 若要切換至不同的建構函式，只要將變更的建構函式標記為註解。To switch to a different constructor, just change which constructors are commented out. > > 如需示範例外狀況的範例快取使用相同的建構函式，請參閱建構函式。For an example that demonstrates exception caching using the same constructors, see the constructor. 這個範例定義將由多個執行緒中的一個執行延遲初始化的 `LargeObject` 類別。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by one of several threads. 程式碼的四個索引鍵的各節將說明建立初始設定式、 的 factory 方法，實際的初始化和的建構函式`LargeObject`類別，建立物件時，會顯示訊息。The four key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the factory method, the actual initialization, and the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, which displays a message when the object is created. 在 `Main` 方法的開頭，此範例會為 `LargeObject` 建立安全執行緒延遲初始設定式:At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the thread-safe lazy initializer for `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] Factory 方法，顯示在建立物件，以進行進一步的初始化預留位置：The factory method shows the creation of the object, with a placeholder for further initialization: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#FactoryFunc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#factoryfunc)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#FactoryFunc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#factoryfunc)] 請注意，使用 lambda 函式，無法合併前, 兩個程式碼區段，如下所示：Note that the first two code sections could be combined by using a lambda function, as shown here: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#InitWithLambda](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/lambda.cs#initwithlambda)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#InitWithLambda](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/lambda.vb#initwithlambda)] 此範例會暫停，表示沒有期限可能會發生延遲初始設定之前停用。The example pauses, to indicate that an indeterminate period may elapse before lazy initialization occurs. 當您按**Enter**索引鍵，此範例會建立並啟動三個執行緒。When you press the **Enter** key, the example creates and starts three threads. `ThreadProc`方法，以供所有的三個執行緒呼叫屬性。The `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads calls the property. 發生這種情況，在第一次`LargeObject`建立執行個體：The first time this happens, the `LargeObject` instance is created: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 建構函式`LargeObject`類別，其中包含程式碼的最後一節，會顯示訊息和記錄初始化執行緒的識別。The constructor of the `LargeObject` class, which includes the last key section of code, displays a message and records the identity of the initializing thread. 程式的輸出會出現在完整的程式碼清單的結尾。The output from the program appears at the end of the full code listing. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#largector)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#largector)] > [!NOTE] > 為了簡化，這個範例使用 的全域執行個體，而且所有方法都是 `static` (Visual Basic 中為 `Shared`)。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 這些不是使用延遲初始設定的必要項。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#all)]

threadsafe.span: 根據預設，所有的 public 和 protected 成員的類別都是安全執行緒，且可能會從多個執行緒同時使用。

span.span: By default, all public and protected members of the class are thread safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

threadsafe.span: （選擇性） 和每個執行個體，使用參數的型別建構函式，可能會移除這些執行緒安全性保證。

span.span: These thread-safety guarantees may be removed optionally and per instance, using parameters to the type's constructors.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 發生延遲初始設定時，會使用目標類型的預設建構函式。

span.span: When lazy initialization occurs, the default constructor of the target type is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可從多個執行緒同時使用這個建構函式來建立執行個體。An instance that is created with this constructor may be used concurrently from multiple threads. 執行緒安全模式的會使用這個建構函式初始化的執行個體是。The thread safety mode of a instance that is initialized with this constructor is . 執行緒安全模式描述的行為，當多個執行緒嘗試初始化執行個體。The thread safety mode describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. A建立使用這個建構函式的執行個體不會快取例外狀況。A instance that is created with this constructor does not cache exceptions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別或 列舉型別。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor. 它也說明如何使用建構函式 (指定`true`如`isThreadSafe`) 和建構函式 (指定如`mode`)。It also illustrates the use of the constructor (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`) and the constructor (specifying for `mode`). 若要切換至不同的建構函式，只要將變更的建構函式標記為註解。To switch to a different constructor, just change which constructors are commented out. 這個範例定義將由多個執行緒中的一個執行延遲初始化的 `LargeObject` 類別。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by one of several threads. 兩個金鑰在此範例中的程式碼行會建立初始設定式和實際初始化。The two key lines of code in this example are the creation of the initializer and the actual initialization. 在 `Main` 方法的開頭，此範例會為 `LargeObject` 建立安全執行緒延遲初始設定式:At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the thread-safe lazy initializer for `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 此範例會建立並啟動三個執行緒上封鎖物件，以便在此範例可以一次釋放執行緒。The example creates and starts three threads that block on a object, so that the example can release the threads all at once. `ThreadProc`方法，以供所有的三個執行緒呼叫屬性來取得`LargeObject`執行個體：The `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads calls the property to get the `LargeObject` instance: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 類別會提供鎖定，因此只有一個執行緒來建立允許`LargeObject`執行個體。The class provides locking, so that only one thread is allowed to create the `LargeObject` instance. 此範例會示範所有其他執行緒都取得相同的執行個體。The example demonstrates that the other threads all get the same instance. > [!NOTE] > 為了簡化，這個範例使用 的全域執行個體，而且所有方法都是 `static` (Visual Basic 中為 `Shared`)。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 這些不是使用延遲初始設定的必要項。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/vb/example.vb#all)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool isThreadSafe) cil managed

param.name: isThreadSafe
param.span: 表示這個執行個體可供多個執行緒同時使用， 表示執行個體一次只能供一個執行緒使用。

span.span: to make this instance usable concurrently by multiple threads; to make the instance usable by only one thread at a time.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 當延遲初始設定發生時，會使用目標類型的預設建構函式和指定的初始設定模式。

span.span: When lazy initialization occurs, the default constructor of the target type and the specified initialization mode are used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行緒安全模式的會使用這個建構函式初始化的執行個體是如果`isThreadSafe`是`true`，否則的模式是。The thread safety mode of a instance that is initialized with this constructor is if `isThreadSafe` is `true`; otherwise, the mode is . 執行緒安全模式描述的行為，當多個執行緒嘗試初始化執行個體。The thread safety mode describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. 若要指定模式中，使用或建構函式。To specify the mode, use the or constructor. A建立使用這個建構函式的執行個體不會快取例外狀況。A instance that is created with this constructor does not cache exceptions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別或 列舉型別。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式來建立不是安全的延遲初始化的物件的所有存取相同的執行緒上都發生的情況下執行緒延遲初始設定式。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to create a lazy initializer that is not thread safe, for scenarios where all access to the lazily initialized object occurs on the same thread. 它也示範如何使用建構函式 (指定如`mode`。It also demonstrates the use of the constructor (specifying for `mode`. 若要切換至不同的建構函式，只要將變更的建構函式標記為註解。To switch to a different constructor, just change which constructor is commented out. > [!NOTE] > 示範如何在多執行緒案例中使用這個建構函式的程式碼 (指定`true`如`isThreadSafe`)，請參閱範例的建構函式。For code that demonstrates how to use this constructor in multithreaded scenarios (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`), see the example for the constructor. 此範例會定義`LargeObject`將執行延遲初始化的類別。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily. 在`Main`方法，此範例會建立執行個體，然後暫停。In the `Main` method, the example creates a instance and then pauses. 當您按**Enter**索引鍵，範例會存取屬性執行個體，這會導致進行初始化。When you press the **Enter** key, the example accesses the property of the instance, which causes initialization to occur. 建構函式`LargeObject`類別會顯示主控台訊息。The constructor of the `LargeObject` class displays a console message. > [!NOTE] > 為了簡化，這個範例使用 的全域執行個體，而且所有方法都是 `static` (Visual Basic 中為 `Shared`)。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 這些不是使用延遲初始設定的必要項。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorBool#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorbool/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorBool#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorbool/vb/example.vb#all)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Func`1<!T> valueFactory) cil managed
Public Sub New (valueFactory As Func(Of T))

param.name: valueFactory
param.span: 委派，需要時會叫用以產生延遲初始化的值。

span.span: The delegate that is invoked to produce the lazily initialized value when it is needed.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 當延遲初始設定發生時，就會使用指定的初始化函式。

span.span: When lazy initialization occurs, the specified initialization function is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可從多個執行緒同時使用這個建構函式來建立執行個體。An instance that is created with this constructor may be used concurrently from multiple threads. 執行緒安全模式的會使用這個建構函式初始化的執行個體是。The thread safety mode of a instance that is initialized with this constructor is . 執行緒安全模式描述的行為，當多個執行緒嘗試初始化執行個體。The thread safety mode describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. 擲回的例外狀況`valueFactory`會快取。Exceptions that are thrown by `valueFactory` are cached. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別或 列舉型別。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式，以提供延遲初始設定快取例外狀況。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to provide lazy initialization with exception caching. 它也示範如何使用建構函式 (指定`true`如`isThreadSafe`) 和建構函式 (指定如`mode`)。It also demonstrates the use of the constructor (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`) and the constructor (specifying for `mode`). 若要切換至不同的建構函式，只要將變更的建構函式標記為註解。To switch to a different constructor, just change which constructors are commented out. 這個範例定義將由多個執行緒中的一個執行延遲初始化的 `LargeObject` 類別。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by one of several threads. 程式碼的三個索引鍵的各節將說明建立初始設定式、 實際初始化，以及建構函式`LargeObject`類別，示範快取例外狀況。The three key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the actual initialization, and the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, which demonstrates exception caching. 在 `Main` 方法的開頭，此範例會為 `LargeObject` 建立安全執行緒延遲初始設定式:At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the thread-safe lazy initializer for `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 此範例會建立並啟動三個執行緒。The example creates and starts three threads. `ThreadProc`方法，以供所有的三個執行緒呼叫屬性來取得`LargeObject`執行個體：The `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads calls the property to get the `LargeObject` instance: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 建構函式中`LargeObject`類別，第三個索引鍵段程式碼擲回例外狀況第一次`LargeObject`執行個體建立時，但之後可讓執行個體建立發生：In the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, the third key section of code throws an exception the first time a `LargeObject` instance is created, but thereafter allows instance creation to occur: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/cs/example.cs#largector)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/vb/example.vb#largector)] 當範例執行時，會嘗試建立的執行個體的第一個執行緒`LargeObject`攔截會失敗，且例外狀況。When the example is run, the first thread that tries to create an instance of `LargeObject` fails, and the exception is caught. 您可能預期的下一個執行緒會成功地建立執行個體，但物件已快取例外狀況。You might expect that the next thread would successfully create an instance, but the object has cached the exception. 因為這個緣故，所有三個執行緒擲回例外狀況。Because of this, all three threads throw the exception. > [!NOTE] > 為了簡化，這個範例使用 的全域執行個體，而且所有方法都是 `static` (Visual Basic 中為 `Shared`)。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 這些不是使用延遲初始設定的必要項。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/vb/example.vb#all)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Threading.LazyThreadSafetyMode mode) cil managed

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一個列舉值會指定執行緒安全模式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the thread safety mode.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體會使用 的預設建構函式和指定的執行緒安全模式。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the default constructor of and the specified thread-safety mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行緒安全模式的執行個體描述的行為，當多個執行緒嘗試初始化執行個體。The thread safety mode of a instance describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. A建立使用這個建構函式的執行個體不會快取例外狀況。A instance that is created with this constructor does not cache exceptions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別或 列舉型別。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式來建立延遲初始設定式，可讓多個執行緒執行延遲建立物件的競爭。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to create a lazy initializer that enables multiple threads to race to create an object lazily. 多個執行緒可能會成功建立執行個體，但所有執行緒都使用第一次建立的執行個體。Multiple threads might succeed in creating instances, but all threads use the instance that was created first. > [!NOTE] > 如需範例，示範如何在單一執行緒案例中使用這個建構函式 (指定如`mode`)，請參閱建構函式。For an example that demonstrates how to use this constructor in single-threaded scenarios (specifying for `mode`), see the constructor. 如需範例，示範如何使用這個建構函式提供的鎖定而不多執行緒案例中的競爭情形 (指定如`mode`)，請參閱建構函式。For an example that demonstrates how to use this constructor to provide locking instead of race conditions in multithreaded scenarios (specifying for `mode`), see the constructor. 此範例會定義`LargeObject`會由任何多個執行緒執行延遲初始化的類別。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by any of several threads. 程式碼的三個主要區段說明建立初始設定式、 實際的初始化和建構函式和完成項的`LargeObject`類別。The three key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the actual initialization, and the constructor and finalizer of the `LargeObject` class. 在開頭`Main`方法，此範例會建立執行延遲初始化的物件`LargeObject`:At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the object that performs lazy initialization of the `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 此範例會建立並啟動三個執行緒上封鎖物件，以便在此範例可以一次釋放執行緒。The example creates and starts three threads that block on a object, so that the example can release the threads all at once. 在`ThreadProc`方法，以供所有的三個執行緒，呼叫屬性建立`LargeObject`執行個體：In the `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads, calling the property creates the `LargeObject` instance: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 因為的建構函式指定執行個體，所有三個執行緒都可建立`LargeObject`執行個體。Because the constructor for the instance specified , all three threads are allowed to create `LargeObject` instances. 範例將提供示範顯示主控台訊息，在建構函式和完成項的`LargeObject`類別：The example demonstrates this by displaying console messages in the constructor and in the finalizer of the `LargeObject` class: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#CtorFinalizer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/cs/example.cs#ctorfinalizer)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#CtorFinalizer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/vb/example.vb#ctorfinalizer)] 不過，物件可確保只有一個執行個體由所有執行緒。However, the object ensures that only one instance is used by all threads. 範例輸出會顯示所有的三個執行緒使用相同的執行個體，以及顯示其他兩個執行個體，可以回收進行回收。The output from the example shows that all three threads use the same instance, and also shows that the other two instances can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 為了簡化，這個範例使用 的全域執行個體，而且所有方法都是 `static` (Visual Basic 中為 `Shared`)。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 這些不是使用延遲初始設定的必要項。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/vb/example.vb#all)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(!T value) cil managed
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Func`1<!T> valueFactory, bool isThreadSafe) cil managed
Public Sub New (valueFactory As Func(Of T), isThreadSafe As Boolean)

param.name: valueFactory
param.span: 委派，需要時會叫用以產生延遲初始化的值。

span.span: The delegate that is invoked to produce the lazily initialized value when it is needed.

param.name: isThreadSafe
param.span: 表示這個執行個體可供多個執行緒同時使用， 表示這個執行個體一次只能供一個執行緒使用。

span.span: to make this instance usable concurrently by multiple threads; to make this instance usable by only one thread at a time.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 當延遲初始設定發生時，會使用指定的初始化函式和初始化模式。

span.span: When lazy initialization occurs, the specified initialization function and initialization mode are used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行緒安全模式的會使用這個建構函式初始化的執行個體是如果`isThreadSafe`是`true`，否則的模式是。The thread safety mode of a instance that is initialized with this constructor is if `isThreadSafe` is `true`; otherwise, the mode is . 執行緒安全模式描述的行為，當多個執行緒嘗試初始化執行個體。The thread safety mode describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. 若要指定模式中，使用或建構函式。To specify the mode, use the or constructor. 擲回的例外狀況`valueFactory`會快取。Exceptions that are thrown by `valueFactory` are cached. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別或 列舉型別。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式，以提供延遲初始設定快取，在案例中，以單一執行緒的例外狀況。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to provide lazy initialization with exception caching, in a scenario with a single thread. 它也示範如何使用建構函式 (指定如`mode`)。It also demonstrates the use of the constructor (specifying for `mode`). 若要切換至該建構函式，只要將變更的建構函式標記為註解。To switch to that constructor, just change which constructor is commented out. > [!NOTE] > 示範如何在多執行緒案例中使用這個建構函式的程式碼 (指定`true`如`isThreadSafe`)，請參閱範例的建構函式。For code that demonstrates how to use this constructor in multithreaded scenarios (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`), see the example for the constructor. 這個範例定義將由多個執行緒中的一個執行延遲初始化的 `LargeObject` 類別。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by one of several threads. 程式碼的三個索引鍵的各節將說明建立初始設定式、 實際初始化，以及建構函式`LargeObject`類別，示範快取例外狀況。The three key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the actual initialization, and the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, which demonstrates exception caching. 在 `Main` 方法的開頭，此範例會為 `LargeObject` 建立安全執行緒延遲初始設定式:At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the thread-safe lazy initializer for `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 在建構函式，呼叫`isThreadSafe`參數是`false`，因此不是安全執行緒。In the call to the constructor, the `isThreadSafe` parameter is `false`, so the is not thread safe. 因為它不是安全執行緒，此範例會呼叫三次的相同執行緒上的屬性：Because it's not thread safe, the example calls the property three times on the same thread: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 建構函式中`LargeObject`類別，第三個索引鍵段程式碼擲回例外狀況第一次`LargeObject`執行個體建立時，但之後可讓執行個體建立發生：In the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, the third key section of code throws an exception the first time a `LargeObject` instance is created, but thereafter allows instance creation to occur: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/cs/example.cs#largector)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/vb/example.vb#largector)] 當範例執行時，第一次嘗試建立的執行個體`LargeObject`攔截會失敗，且例外狀況。When the example is run, the first attempt to create an instance of `LargeObject` fails, and the exception is caught. 您所料下, 一次的嘗試會成功，但物件已快取例外狀況。You might expect that the next attempt would succeed, but the object has cached the exception. 因為這個緣故，所有的三次嘗試，會擲回例外狀況。Because of this, all three attempts throw the exception. > [!NOTE] > 為了簡化，這個範例使用 的全域執行個體，而且所有方法都是 `static` (Visual Basic 中為 `Shared`)。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 這些不是使用延遲初始設定的必要項。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/vb/example.vb#all)]

Public Sub New (valueFactory As Func(Of T), mode As LazyThreadSafetyMode)

param.name: valueFactory
param.span: 委派，需要時會叫用以產生延遲初始化的值。

span.span: The delegate that is invoked to produce the lazily initialized value when it is needed.

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一個列舉值會指定執行緒安全模式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the thread safety mode.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新行個體，這個執行個體會使用指定的初始設定函式和執行緒安全模式。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the specified initialization function and thread-safety mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行緒安全模式的執行個體描述的行為，當多個執行緒嘗試初始化執行個體。The thread safety mode of a instance describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. 擲回的例外狀況`valueFactory`會快取，除非`mode`是。Exceptions that are thrown by `valueFactory` are cached, unless `mode` is . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別或 列舉型別。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式來建立延遲初始設定式，可讓多個執行緒執行延遲建立物件的競爭。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to create a lazy initializer that enables multiple threads to race to create an object lazily. 多個執行緒可能會成功建立執行個體，但所有執行緒都使用第一次建立的執行個體。Multiple threads might succeed in creating instances, but all threads use the instance that was created first. 此外，此範例示範的例外狀況會永遠不會快取指定時，即使延遲建立的類型的預設建構函式的函式，而不是由執行初始化。In addition, the example demonstrates that exceptions are never cached when you specify , even if initialization is performed by a function instead of by the default constructor of the lazily created type. > [!NOTE] > 如需範例，示範如何在單一執行緒案例中使用這個建構函式 (指定如`mode`)，請參閱建構函式。For an example that demonstrates how to use this constructor in single-threaded scenarios (specifying for `mode`), see the constructor. 如需範例，示範如何使用這個建構函式提供的鎖定而不多執行緒案例中的競爭情形 (指定如`mode`)，請參閱建構函式。For an example that demonstrates how to use this constructor to provide locking instead of race conditions in multithreaded scenarios (specifying for `mode`), see the constructor. 此範例會定義`LargeObject`會由任何多個執行緒執行延遲初始化的類別。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by any of several threads. 程式碼的四個主要區段說明建立初始設定式、 實際初始化、 初始化函式和建構函式和完成項的`LargeObject`類別。The four key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the actual initialization, the initialization function, and the constructor and finalizer of the `LargeObject` class. 在開頭`Main`方法，此範例會建立執行延遲初始化的物件`LargeObject`:At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the object that performs lazy initialization of the `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 延遲初始設定式會使用函式執行初始化。The lazy initializer uses a function to perform the initialization. 在此情況下，功能是必要的所以沒有預設建構函式`LargeObject`類別。In this case, a function is required because there is no default constructor for the `LargeObject` class. 此範例會建立並啟動三個執行緒上封鎖物件，以便在此範例可以一次釋放執行緒。The example creates and starts three threads that block on a object, so that the example can release the threads all at once. 在`ThreadProc`方法，以供所有的三個執行緒，呼叫屬性建立`LargeObject`執行個體：In the `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads, calling the property creates the `LargeObject` instance: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 在第三個主要區段中的程式碼，延遲初始設定函式會呼叫建立`LargeObject`執行個體。In the third key section of code, the lazy initialization function is called to create the `LargeObject` instance. 此函式會擲回例外狀況的第一次呼叫：The function throws an exception the first time it's called: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#FactoryFunc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#factoryfunc)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#FactoryFunc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#factoryfunc)] 與任何其他設定，初始化函式處理的例外狀況會快取。With any other setting, an unhandled exception in the initialization function would be cached. 不過，隱藏快取例外狀況。However, suppresses exception caching. 範例輸出示範以初始化物件的後續嘗試會成功。The output from the example demonstrates that a subsequent attempt to initialize the object succeeds. > [!NOTE] > 例外狀況訊息通常會顯示訊息，指出其他執行緒都已成功初始化物件之後。The exception message usually appears after messages indicating that other threads have successfully initialized the object. 這是因為擲回和攔截例外狀況時導入的延遲。This is because of the delay introduced by throwing and catching the exception. 因為的建構函式指定執行個體，所有三個執行緒都可建立`LargeObject`執行個體。Because the constructor for the instance specified , all three threads are allowed to create `LargeObject` instances. 範例將提供示範顯示主控台訊息，在建構函式和完成項的`LargeObject`類別：The example demonstrates this by displaying console messages in the constructor and in the finalizer of the `LargeObject` class: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#CtorFinalizer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#ctorfinalizer)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#CtorFinalizer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#ctorfinalizer)] 物件可確保只有一個執行個體由所有執行緒 （除非初始設定函式擲回例外狀況的執行緒）。The object ensures that only one instance is used by all threads (except the thread where the initialization function throws an exception). 範例輸出顯示這點。The output from the example shows this. > [!NOTE] > 為了簡化，這個範例使用 的全域執行個體，而且所有方法都是 `static` (Visual Basic 中為 `Shared`)。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 這些不是使用延遲初始設定的必要項。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#all)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsValueCreated As Boolean
public: property bool IsValueCreated { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示是否已建立此 執行個體的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a value has been created for this instance.

value.span: 如果已建立此 執行個體的值則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a value has been created for this instance; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當延遲初始設定發生執行個體，它可能會導致正在建立的值或擲回例外狀況。When lazy initialization occurs for a instance, it may result in either a value being created or an exception being thrown. 如果例外狀況擲回，後續的行為執行個體取決於快取例外狀況是否作用中。If an exception is thrown, subsequent behavior of the instance depends on whether exception caching is in effect. 如果建立執行個體所使用的建構函式未指定的初始化函式，則快取例外狀況為非作用中。If the instance was created by using a constructor that does not specify an initialization function, then exception caching is not in effect. 後續嘗試初始化可能會成功，並在成功初始化之後屬性會傳回`true`。A subsequent attempt to initialize the might succeed, and after successful initialization the property returns `true`. 如果初始化函式以建立執行個體 (所指定`valueFactory`參數建構函式)，則快取例外狀況由執行緒安全模式。If the instance was created with an initialization function (specified by the `valueFactory` parameter of the constructor), then exception caching is controlled by the thread safety mode. - 如果模式是或，來初始化沒有第二個機會執行個體。If the mode is or , there is no second chance to initialize the instance. 如果發生例外狀況，就會發生的初始化函式中未處理，該例外狀況是快取及重新擲回的後續存取屬性。If an exception occurs and is unhandled in the initialization function, that exception is cached and rethrown on subsequent accesses of the property. 如果擲回例外狀況，因此在這種情況下，任何值則會建立傳回`false`。No value is created if an exception is thrown, so in such cases returns `false`. - 如果模式是，成功地執行的初始化函式 （或預設建構函式） 的第一個執行緒建立的值執行個體。If the mode is , the first thread that succeeds in running the initialization function (or the default constructor) creates the value for the instance. 如果在一個執行緒上初始化函式擲回的例外狀況，其他的執行緒仍可嘗試初始化執行個體。If the initialization function throws an exception on one thread, other threads can still try to initialize the instance. 值建立，直到屬性會傳回`false`。Until the value is created, the property returns `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 建立並傳回這個執行個體之 屬性的字串表示。

span.span: Creates and returns a string representation of the property for this instance.

returns.span: 針對此執行個體在 屬性上呼叫 方法的結果，前提是已經建立此值 (也就是說，如果 屬性傳回 )。

span.span: The result of calling the method on the property for this instance, if the value has been created (that is, if the property returns ).

returns.span: 否則為表示尚未建立值的字串。

span.span: Otherwise, a string indicating that the value has not been created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法不會初始化。Calling this method does not cause initialization. 屬性可以是`null`後延遲初始設定，如果該處理站方法，為指定`valueFactory`參數， ，或建構函式會傳回`null`。The property can be `null` after lazy initialization if the factory method that was specified for the `valueFactory` parameter of the , , or constructor returns `null`.

span.span: The property is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As T
public: property T Value { T get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前 執行個體的延遲初始化值。

span.span: Gets the lazily initialized value of the current instance.

value.span: 目前 執行個體的延遲初始化值。

span.span: The lazily initialized value of the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`false`、 存取屬性會強制初始化。If the property is `false`, accessing the property forces initialization. 除了所列的例外狀況屬性可以擲回任何未處理的例外狀況擲回的 factory 方法，傳遞給`valueFactory`參數， ，或建構函式。In addition to the exceptions that are listed, the property can throw any unhandled exception that is thrown by the factory method that was passed to the `valueFactory` parameter of the , , or constructor.

exception.span: 執行個體已初始化為使用延遲初始化型別的預設建構函式，而且存取建構函式的使用權限已遺失。

span.span: The instance is initialized to use the default constructor of the type that is being lazily initialized, and permissions to access the constructor are missing.

exception.span: 執行個體已初始化為使用延遲初始化型別的預設建構函式，而且該型別沒有公用無參數的建構函式。

span.span: The instance is initialized to use the default constructor of the type that is being lazily initialized, and that type does not have a public, parameterless constructor.

exception.span: 初始設定函式嘗試存取這個執行個體的 。

span.span: The initialization function tries to access on this instance.
